Exaggerate: The claim by Joe Biden that he has released "22 years of tax returns" is accurate and supported by evidence.
Understate: There is no evidence to suggest that Joe Biden has understated or downplayed the number of tax returns he has released.
Lack enough support: The claim that Donald Trump has not released any tax returns is supported by the fact that he has refused to release them, citing a pending audit.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for why Donald Trump has not released his tax returns, which is that he is under audit by the IRS.
Contradict fact: There is no evidence to suggest that the claim contradicts any facts.
Falters at times: There is no evidence to suggest that the claim falters or is inconsistent at any point.
Problematic assumption: There is no evidence to suggest that the claim is based on any problematic assumptions.
